original_title: Attack on Katana apparel factory owner due to company’s internal issue: Indika Anuruddha
original_body_lines: The attack on the apparel factory owner in Katana is a result of an internal issue within the company, State Minister Indika Anuruddha said today.
State Minister Anuruddha who made a statement in Parliament said it will take some time to uncover information on the internal issue.

"The media has questioned me on this incident and I have told them that it is a result of an internal issue within the company. I have also told them that the investigations will be a time-consuming process,” the State Minister said.

“An employee attached to the Board of Investment has also been involved as he had urged the company concerned to support a certain political leader in the area. This officer has been removed from BOI,” he added.
“No complaint has been lodged against me though an MP has alleged that I am involved in the incident ,” he added. (Yohan Perera and Ajith Siriwardana)
